sentences.en: I descry a sail on the horizon.
sentences.cn: 我看见在天水交接处的轮船.

sentences.en: In this beautiful sunset photo, I seem to descry the wings of the angel.
sentences.cn: 在美丽日落照片中, 我好像看到天使的翅膀.

sentences.en: Learn to foster an ardent imagination; so shall you descry beauty which others unheeded.
sentences.cn: 学会培养炽热的想象力, 这样你就能发现别人视而不见的美.

trans.tran_cn: 察看, 发现, 远远看到
trans.tran_en: to discern or make out; catch sight of

trans.tran_cn: 看见，看出，辨认出，发现，查看，责备，谴责
